MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Park Avenue and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team have advised that in order to complete a repair and alter supplies on our underground cable network, we need to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2.55PM. This may affect the supply to your property. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 2.37PM on 25 April 2021.
